About Me

I am a student at the University of Rochester, majoring in Physics and Astronomy, as well as minoring in Computer Science. Currently seeking a Data Science or Web Development internship for Summer 2022

University of Rochester: The Discover Grant 2020

Selective award for undergraduates interested in research at the University of Rochester

Caltech: SURF Scholar 2021

Highly competitive opportunity for undergraduates to conduct research at the California Institute of Technology over a period of 8 weeks during the summer

Sigma Pi Sigma Honors Society

Honors society for Physics/Astronomy students awarded to the top 1/3rd of a class

My Hobbies

Usually playing video-games, watching anime, youtube or twitch and going to the gym when I am not working

Anime

I love anime. Having watched over 250 anime at this point, I am moving on to reading manga. Please hit me up if you are even slightly inteested in anime. Free recommendation: watch Steins; Gate. You will not regret it

Youtube

I love watching popular science videos on youtube, as well as playthroughs, competitive pokemon, and am a huge fan of internet humour. Favorite youtubers: Veratasium, Ludwig, Trash Taste, freeCodeCamp.org, Traversy Media, Kurzgesagt, xQc, and many more

Gaming

Mostly play single-player narrative driven games, such as, God of War, games by FromSoft (Dark Souls/Sekiro/Elden Ring/ Bloodborne) and Pokemon. Usually playing on my PS5 or Switch. Planning on buying a PC once graphics cards don't cost an arm and a leg

Working out

Recently got into working out - lifting as well as cardio - but also play a little badminton. Not the most knowledgeable when it comes to working out so would love to learn more from people
